message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $10,000. I believe it's a great deal for you, and I'm hoping we can come to an agreement. Let me know your thoughts!

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate it, but I think I can find a better deal elsewhere. I would like to propose a price of $9,000 for the product. Please let me know if this is something you can consider.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $9,000 is still a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down a little further to $9,500.  This is a good deal for both of us, and I'm confident you'll see the value in this product.  Let me know if you're interested.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a price of $9,200 for the product. I hope this meets your expectations and allows me to purchase the product at a reasonable cost.
